author: Elizabeth Gravier
title: The 5 types of expenses experts say you should never charge on a credit card
description: You can put most everyday expenses on a credit card — but not these. Personal finance experts weigh in on which expenses you should reconsider using a card to pay for so you can avoid "credit creep" and stay out of debt.
content:
